Item ID1199

The Adamant kiteshield is the second-best smithable kiteshield, requiring 30 Defence to wield. A player with 82 Smithing can make the shield by using three adamantite bars on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 187.5 Smithing experience.

 Attack bonuses

[[File:Adamant kiteshield detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''Adamant kiteshield''' is the second-best smithable kiteshield, requiring 30 [[Defence]] to wield. A player with 82 [[Smithing]] can make the shield by using three [[adamantite bar]]s on an [[anvil]] while carrying a [[hammer]], granting 187.5 Smithing [[experience]].
